name: Runster Demo
detailed_description:
Runster, interactive exercise game on PC. It's team-based action gameplay that entirely controlled by your gesture. Enjoy running along with realistic action experience, Capture the base, collect points, and destroy rivals together with your team. No need pricey devices required. You can enjoy the interactive experience with a smartphone(with gyroscope sensor) and PC.
Not only fun, but the game also tracks your physical activity from playing. You can have an enjoyable experience and maintain your fitness balanced at home at the same time.

Not only the new way to enjoy a workout. The game will let you create a strategy by different characters with individual skill. To get the highest scores, you'll have to capture the Powerplants as much as you can and defeat the other team to get their scores. So you'll need to work together for protecting your scores or take it from the others.
